        exploreUrl.push(explore('âœ£ã€' + Account + 'ã€‘âœ£', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxzf-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + 'âœ”ï¸', '', 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('æ”¶è—', `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/favorite?tp=1-{{page}}&apimhstatus=all`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ¦œã€€ã€€å•  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-topestmh-<,{{page}}>`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('æ’è¡Œ', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-newest-<,{{page}}>`;

url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/getpage/tp/1-cnxh-{{page}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('æ¨è', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ ‡ã€€ã€€ç­¾  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/home/book/cate.html')).select('.tagBtnClass');
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
P = `{{Get('p')}}`;

    url = `{{Get('url')}}/home/api/cate/tp/1-${kind[i].attr('data-value')}-${P}-1-{{page}}-${Q}-1-${O}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].attr('data-value') + kind[i].select('span').text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

var Link = '';
var Intro = '';

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1');
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("xxzf-sign"))) {
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("xxzf-sign", signdate);
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes('/favorite')) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).result.data;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].lastcapter + 'ã€”' + list[i].update_time + 'ã€•',
                'intro': list[i].desc,
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].image,
                'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].bid
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/1-(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '1-' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list;
        for (i in list) {
            var kind = (list[i].mhstatus > 0 ? 'å®Œç»“' : 'è¿è½½') + ',' + (list[i].limitVip == 'false' ? '' : 'VIP') + ',' + list[i].keyword;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].auther.replace(/,/g, '/'),
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter_title + 'ã€”' + list[i].update_time + 'ã€•',
                'intro': list[i].desc,
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].image,
                'url': Get('url') + '/home/book/index/id/' + list[i].id
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+)(-\d-\d-\d)$/, function(match, p1, p2) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + p2;}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).result.list[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/home/api/searchk?keyword=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&type=1&pageNo={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
